page.title: 11BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {WEDNESDAY IN THE SUMMER TERM} I GET AWAKENED BY MY CLOCK RADIO.I GET OUT OF BED AND TURN ON MY TELEVISION WHILE PUTTING ON MY SCHOOL UNIFORM OF GREY TROUSERS, SHIRT AND PULLOVER WITH A GREEN AND YELLOW TIE.I HAVE MY BREAK FAST CEREAL,MADE FROM CORN AND EATEN WITH MILK. THEN I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL WHICH IS ALONG AN ALLEY,CARS CAN ENTER AT ONE END.AT 8:50 WE GO IN AND AFTER A THIRTY MINUTE ASSEMBLY THERE IS MATHS FOLLOWED BY PLAYTIME. NEXT MUSIC FROM A RADIO PROGRAMME WITH PAMPHLETS CONTAINING WORDS AND MUSIC.AFTERWARDS WE CHANGE INTO SHORTS AND T SHIRTS FOR APPARATUS (GYM) IN THE HALL. DINNER AT MIDDAY IS A TWO COURSE MEAL WITH WATER TO DRINK. IN THE AFTERNOON, BECAUSE OF OUR SCHOOL JOURNEY,WE LEARN ABOUT THE ISLE OF WIGHT. WE ARE GOING THERE FOR A WEEK ON OUR SCHOOL JOURNEY.
